title: How to Design a Bedspring Flower Pot Holder

steps.headline: Gather bedspring(s).
steps.description: The first supply to obtain is the bedspring as it will help you determine the size and shape of the flower pot. Choose your bedspring based on overall design scheme. Bedsprings are typically silver metal so you can either antique the spring for a unique look or you can build your flower Potholder and allow time and the weather to provide that antique appeal. Make sure the bedspring is in good shape and can hold and accommodate the flower pot.

steps.headline: Choose your flower pot(s).
steps.description: You will need a flower pot that can fit easily inside the smaller end of a bedspring so consider bringing your bedspring with you to the garden shop when shopping for the flower pot.

steps.headline: Pick up epoxy glue and either ceramic glaze or paint.
steps.description: The paint and/or glaze is optional depending on the kind of look you hope to achieve. You will need the glue to adhere the pot to the spring and make it a permanent fixture.

steps.headline: Finish your bedspring and/or flower pot.
steps.description: If you plan to add paint or glaze to the bedspring and/or flower pot, your first step should be to add your glaze or paint. Allow for ample dry time so you don’t compromise your design when assembling the flower pot.

steps.headline: Turn the bedspring upside down so that the wider end is on the floor/surface and the smaller end is facing upward.
Line the inside of the top three bedspring rings with glue.
steps.description: Work quickly as you don’t want the glue to dry before you add the flower pot.

steps.headline: Drop the flower pot into the bedspring with care.
steps.description: Position the flower pot inside the bedspring and allow the glue to dry and adhere to the pot. The bedspring may bend slightly with the weight of the flower pot. The bending may give your design more of a distinctive appeal.

steps.headline: Add dirt and flowers/seeds to the flower pot.
steps.description: Add water when ready and place pot in the sun.
